meaningMnemonic: Why would you try to take a <radical>brush</radical> to the <radical>sun</radical>? It's almost too obvious, because you want to <kanji>write</kanji> something down.
readingMnemonic: What did you <kanji>write</kanji> about? You were writing about this amazing circus <reading>show</reading> (しょ) you just watched on the sun. You didn't expect there to be any shows here, but turns out you were wrong!
